title: GitLab CI CD Tutorial for Beginners [Crash Course]

media:group.media:title: GitLab CI CD Tutorial for Beginners [Crash Course]
media:group.media:description:
Learn GitLab CI/CD by building a complete CICD pipeline for a python demo project | with Docker

‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨   What you‚Äôll learn in 1 Hour  ‚úÖ  ‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨ 
‚ñ∫  What GitLab CI/CD is
‚ñ∫  GitLab compared to other CI/CD platforms
‚ñ∫  Overview of GitLab Architecture
‚ñ∫  Build a full GitLab CI/CD pipeline for a python app that
    - executes tests,
    - builds a Docker image,
    - pushes to a private Docker repository and
    - deploys the app to a remote server on DigitalOcean
‚ñ∫  Learn GitLab Basic Concepts on the way:
    - Pipeline, Jobs,
    - Stages
    - GitLab Runners and Executors
    - Variables (Variable and File Type)
    - Docker in Docker


‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨  R E F E R E N C E S  üîó‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨

‚ñ∫   Docker in Docker Image: https://hub.docker.com/_/docker
